PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2000-11022000-07-270,  ,  ,  ,  ,  HERITAGE
PrecisAmendment to Order in Council P.C. 2000-511 of April 5, 2000 by changing the final date for completion of the CRTC's report concerning the assessment of availability and quality of French-language broadcasting services in the French linguistic minorities communities in Canada from December 31, 2000 to February 12, 2001.
